document_data.name: Ignan
document_data.mainbody: '''Ignan''' was a language from the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].<ref name=MotP-p74>
document_data.Description: Ignan was a language full of sharp clicks and hisses.<ref name=MotP-p74/>
document_data.Speakers:
It was the tongue of many creatures of fire,

It was considered a dialect of [[Primordial language|Primordial]], so that creatures who spoke one of the other elemental dialects such as [[Aquan]], [[Auran]], or [[Terran]] could understand Ignan and vice-versa.
